description:
Files store more information than you might realize. Photos taken with a mobile phone, for instance, contain details on the camera's settings, but also the model of the phone and the geographic coordinates the picture was taken at.

MAT is a handy tool for removing this metadata. In stand-alone mode you can see what metadata is in files and remove it entirely or selectively. But you also get the option to right click a file in your file manager and remove metadata that way.
summary: Very handy for removing metadata embedded in files

description: Limpia tus fotos de metadatos antes de subirlas en linea o compartilas con aplicaciones de mensajería. No regales tus metadatos.
